name: Swaid the Blob
description:
This is Swaid the Blob a game where you play as Swaid and must defeat the evil giant blob named Giaree. You fight enemy blobs name Gary and must get 70 kills to spawn the boss fight. You can use between Short sword and Katana to Uzi and Pistol.

Hop into the game you don't even have to download it(you can if you want to)
it is play in browser.
